name: Call to Roost
description:
Call to Roost is a survival/pet simulator game that was made using Game Maker Studio 2 for the GameWithUS game jam

The game is about surviving and improving your living conditions using the help of your pet. The entire game revolves around the buttons on the upper left and the messages on the lower left corner.

The game has measurements for your hunger, your pet hunger and your pet mood, but they are all hidden (just like real life) but you do get messages from time to time to update you if they are decreasing or increasing

Programmer: Mohamed_DKD (dark_knight_dad)

Game Idea and dialogues: Tyrel

Artist: Dawson
